channel.title: Comments on: So I got Far Cry 3 from the summer sale a while back, just doing side objectives at the moment, wanted to know a few of your guys’ experience (preferably spoiler free)

item.title: By: comeatnenoob
item.dc:creator: comeatnenoob
item.description: Maybe stick around for the crab Rangoon. I hear it’s pretty good
item.content:encoded: Maybe stick around for the crab Rangoon. I hear it’s pretty good

item.title: By: cruelcumber_salad
item.dc:creator: cruelcumber_salad
item.description: Fun game. I like the weather in this game. The rain storms are wild. Some of the animals are fun to hunt. Enjoy!
item.content:encoded: Fun game. I like the weather in this game. The rain storms are wild. Some of the animals are fun to hunt. Enjoy!

item.title: By: CK2056
item.dc:creator: CK2056
item.description: I haven't beaten it myself, but I do really enjoy it. I'm currently kind of stuck trying to silently take out one of the enemy camps. It seems like no matter what I do one of those runners always know right away and get me.
item.content:encoded: I haven’t beaten it myself, but I do really enjoy it. I’m currently kind of stuck trying to silently take out one of the enemy camps. It seems like no matter what I do one of those runners always know right away and get me.

item.title: By: shoveazy
item.dc:creator: shoveazy
item.description: Played it for a while but got bored with it and never finished. The map feels huge, but never feels like there's a reason for it to be so big. Not much variety. Taking outposts was fun and that's about all I got out of it before putting it down. Performance on PS4 also sucks, it has a choppy framerate. It was fun while it lasted, just not enough got me to want to finish the game.
item.content:encoded: Played it for a while but got bored with it and never finished. The map feels huge, but never feels like there’s a reason for it to be so big. Not much variety. Taking outposts was fun and that’s about all I got out of it before putting it down. Performance on PS4 also sucks, it has a choppy framerate. It was fun while it lasted, just not enough got me to want to finish the game.

item.title: By: hamm10108
item.dc:creator: hamm10108
item.description: My favorite game of all time. Enjoy
item.content:encoded: My favorite game of all time. Enjoy

item.title: By: ThisFckinGuy
item.dc:creator: ThisFckinGuy
item.description:
Personally I love it. I played FC2 and appreciated it for what it was, more of a survival game than a FPS by today's standards.
FC3 came out and gave us the additional save spots, gunplay, while still keeping the jungle vibe and world setting. All of the weapons are polished and have a decent selection. Also the bad guy is memorable and quotable. FC3 was improved upon again by FC4 with an additional gun slot and stuff you'll say, "damn I wish 3 had this".
Play it, it's a great game. If you played 4 or 5 then you'll notice what's missing from 3, but if you haven't then I believe you'll thoroughly enjoy it going in blind without those to compare it too.
Also when you finish is watch the Christopher Mintz Plasse far cry 3 mini movie on YouTube because, again VAS the bad guy is a fucking amazing character.
Also all the DLC for these games are entertaining, colorful, creative. Bad Dragon is the one for 3 so check it out!
item.content:encoded:
Personally I love it. I played FC2 and appreciated it for what it was, more of a survival game than a FPS by today’s standards.

FC3 came out and gave us the additional save spots, gunplay, while still keeping the jungle vibe and world setting. All of the weapons are polished and have a decent selection. Also the bad guy is memorable and quotable. FC3 was improved upon again by FC4 with an additional gun slot and stuff you’ll say, “damn I wish 3 had this”.

Play it, it’s a great game. If you played 4 or 5 then you’ll notice what’s missing from 3, but if you haven’t then I believe you’ll thoroughly enjoy it going in blind without those to compare it too.

Also when you finish is watch the Christopher Mintz Plasse far cry 3 mini movie on YouTube because, again VAS the bad guy is a fucking amazing character.

Also all the DLC for these games are entertaining, colorful, creative. Bad Dragon is the one for 3 so check it out!

item.title: By: SIRTreehugger
item.dc:creator: SIRTreehugger
item.description: Still my favorite Far Cry game in the series. Also the Blood Dragon DLC was amazing.
item.content:encoded: Still my favorite Far Cry game in the series. Also the Blood Dragon DLC was amazing.

item.title: By: BeastMaster0844
item.dc:creator: BeastMaster0844
item.description:
It’s my favorite FC game. I’ve played them all, but 3 always sticks out to me.
5 I never finished because of how they force progress and then once you complete a regions bunker mission it eliminates all world enemies from that region making returning to that region to free roam pointless because there’s no enemies anymore.
4 was a step up from 3 and I liked it, but for some reason I always go back to 3.
item.content:encoded:
It’s my favorite FC game. I’ve played them all, but 3 always sticks out to me.

5 I never finished because of how they force progress and then once you complete a regions bunker mission it eliminates all world enemies from that region making returning to that region to free roam pointless because there’s no enemies anymore.

4 was a step up from 3 and I liked it, but for some reason I always go back to 3.
